directions: In a large bowl whisk together the lemon juice, the oil, salt and pepper to taste until the dressing is emulsified, add the watercress, the lettuce, the radishes, and the walnuts, and toss the salad well.
ingredients: 1/2 bunch of watercress, coarse stems discarded and the leaves ;washed well and spun dry (about 2 cups)
2 cups torn Boston lettuce, washed well and spun dry
1/4 cup walnuts, toasted lightly and chopped
title: Watercress and Boston Lettuce Salad with Walnuts
